root.name: Reincarnations: Awakening
root.description: Overview Reincarnations: Awakening is a hidden object/puzzle game developed by Vogat Interactive and published by Big Fish Games for the PC in 2009. System RequirementsOperating System - Windows XP/ Windows Vista/ Windows 7CPU - 600 MhzRAM - 256 MBDirect X - 7 or higherHard Drive Space - 188 MB
